mapper.select: select * from (select a.*,rownum rnum from (select p.profit_num,p.profit_money, p.profit_regdate, m.id from profit p join member m on p.m_num = m.m_num order by p.profit_regdate desc) a) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}

select * from (select a.*,rownum rnum from (select sum(p.profit_money) total, m.id, g.grade_name from profit p, member m, grade g where p.m_num = m.m_num and m.grade_num = g.grade_num group by m.m_num,m.id,g.grade_name order by total desc)a) where rnum<=5
